entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miscou Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miscou Island 04:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: WSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
